00014 using pi_generator::PiGenerator;

00016 // This file implements functions that the plugin is expected to implement so
00017 // that the browser can all them.  All of them are required to be implemented
00018 // regardless of whether this is a trusted or untrusted build of the module.
00019 
00020 
00021 // Called after NP_Initialize with a Plugin Instance Pointer and context
00022 // information for the plugin instance that is being allocated.
00023 // Declaration: npapi.h
00024 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPP_New
00025 NPError NPP_New(NPMIMEType mime_type,
00026                 NPP instance,
00027                 uint16_t mode,
00028                 int16_t argc,
00029                 char* argn[],
00030                 char* argv[],
00031                 NPSavedData* saved) {
00032   extern void InitializePepperExtensions(NPP instance);
00033   if (instance == NULL) {
00034     return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00035   }
00036 
00037   InitializePepperExtensions(instance);
00038 
00039   PiGenerator* pi_generator = new(std::nothrow) PiGenerator(instance);
00040   if (pi_generator == NULL) {
00041     return NPERR_OUT_OF_MEMORY_ERROR;
00042   }
00043 
00044   instance->pdata = pi_generator;
00045   return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00046 }
00047 
00048 // Called when a Plugin |instance| is being deleted by the browser.  This
00049 // function should clean up any information allocated by NPP_New but not
00050 // NP_Initialize.  Use |save| to store any information that should persist but
00051 // note that browser may choose to throw it away.
00052 // In the NaCl module, NPP_Destroy is called from NaClNP_MainLoop().
00053 // Declaration: npapi.h
00054 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPP_Destroy
00055 NPError NPP_Destroy(NPP instance, NPSavedData** save) {
00056   if (instance == NULL) {
00057     return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00058   }
00059 
00060   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(instance->pdata);
00061   if (pi_generator != NULL) {
00062     delete pi_generator;
00063   }
00064   return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00065 }
00066 
00067 // NPP_GetScriptableInstance retruns the NPObject pointer that corresponds to
00068 // NPPVpluginScriptableNPObject queried by NPP_GetValue() from the browser.
00069 // Helper function for NPP_GetValue to create this plugin's NPObject.
00070 // |instance| is this plugin's representation in the browser.  Returns the new
00071 // NPObject or NULL.
00072 // Declaration: local
00073 // Documentation URL: N/A (not actually an NPAPI function)
00074 NPObject* NPP_GetScriptableInstance(NPP instance) {
00075   if (instance == NULL) {
00076     return NULL;
00077   }
00078 
00079   NPObject* object = NULL;
00080   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(instance->pdata);
00081   if (pi_generator) {
00082     object = pi_generator->GetScriptableObject();
00083   }
00084   return object;
00085 }
00086 
00087 // Implemented so the browser can get a scriptable instance from this plugin.
00088 // Declaration: npapi.h
00089 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPP_GetValue
00090 NPError NPP_GetValue(NPP instance, NPPVariable variable, void *value) {
00091   if (NPPVpluginScriptableNPObject == variable) {
00092     NPObject* scriptable_object = NPP_GetScriptableInstance(instance);
00093     if (scriptable_object == NULL)
00094       return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00095     *reinterpret_cast<NPObject**>(value) = scriptable_object;
00096     return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00097   }
00098   return NPERR_INVALID_PARAM;
00099 }
00100 
00101 // |event| just took place in this plugin's window in the browser.  This
00102 // function should return true if the event was handled, false if it was
00103 // ignored.
00104 // Declaration: npapi.h
00105 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPP_HandleEvent
00106 int16_t NPP_HandleEvent(NPP instance, void* event) {
00107   return 0;
00108 }
00109 
00110 // |window| contains the current state of the window in the browser.  If this
00111 // is called, that state has probably changed recently.
00112 // Declaration: npapi.h
00113 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPP_SetWindow
00114 NPError NPP_SetWindow(NPP instance, NPWindow* window) {
00115   if (instance == NULL) {
00116     return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00117   }
00118   if (window == NULL) {
00119     return NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00120   }
00121   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(instance->pdata);
00122   if (pi_generator != NULL) {
00123     return pi_generator->SetWindow(window);
00124   }
00125   return NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00126 }
00127 
00128 extern "C" {
00129 // When the browser calls NP_Initialize the plugin needs to return a list
00130 // of functions that have been implemented so that the browser can
00131 // communicate with the plugin.  This function populates that list,
00132 // |plugin_funcs|, with pointers to the functions.
00133 NPError InitializePluginFunctions(NPPluginFuncs* plugin_funcs) {
00134   memset(plugin_funcs, 0, sizeof(*plugin_funcs));
00135   plugin_funcs->version = NPVERS_HAS_PLUGIN_THREAD_ASYNC_CALL;
00136   plugin_funcs->size = sizeof(*plugin_funcs);
00137   plugin_funcs->newp = NPP_New;
00138   plugin_funcs->destroy = NPP_Destroy;
00139   plugin_funcs->setwindow = NPP_SetWindow;
00140   plugin_funcs->event = NPP_HandleEvent;
00141   plugin_funcs->getvalue = NPP_GetValue;
00142   return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00143 }
00144 
00145 }  // extern "C"
